If you have already taken stats level at university, it is likely that you have met the linear regression method. 

It is the most fundamental algorithm for regression and if you truly master it, you will be way ahead of the curve when it comes to the most advanced Machine Learning algorithms.

Join the lecture 7 October 2022 2pm at **NAB LG.01 (Wolfson Theatre)**..
